description.value:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger An enemy's Strike would hit you, and you weren't already @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Concealed], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Hidden], or undetected to that enemy.

You momentarily slip into the Drift, becoming concealed against the triggering Strike. If the flat check for concealment fails, the Strike misses you. After resolving the triggering Strike, you reemerge from the Drift in an unoccupied space adjacent to your original square.
